snippet: At the David Zwirner gallery, Adel Abdessemed presents an ambitious array of politically impassioned objects.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews works by Adel Abdessemed at David Zwirner gallery.
lead_paragraph: At the David Zwirner gallery, Adel Abdessemed presents an ambitious array of politically impassioned objects.

headline.seo: ADEL ABDESSEMED: ‘Who’s Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf’
